text: Glen Alan Kuiper (born May 20, 1963) is a broadcaster for CSN California with the Oakland Athletics as a play-by-play announcer. He is the younger brother of former baseball player and broadcaster for the San Francisco Giants, Duane Kuiper. Glen also calls occasional A's games on Fox. He currently works with Ray Fosse. He was a field reporter for A's telecasts and hosted pregame shows for the A's and 'Giants. Outside of baseball, he was a sideline reporter for the NFL on Fox and for the San Jose Sharks. He handles various assignments for college football, college basketball, and the Golden State Warriors. title: Glen Kuiper
